Text.Value: Does Gortash have any weaknesses I can use against him?
How did you get tadpoled?
Leave.
Too much... trouble... needed... money... sold him off...
Heavy debts... no way to repay...
Why did you sell your son?
Enver... came to us... forced worm... into our heads...
Use his work... against him...
Trouble... with Guild... warlock offered... good coin...
Gortash is dead.
Revenge... for... selling him... had no... choice...
What was Gortash like as a child?
Clever boy... always... tinkering. Traps... mechanisms...
Dravo... Flymm... father of... Enver Flymm... Gortash...
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
*The corpse regards you lifelessly.*
Steel Watchers... are his... greatest weapon...
Who are you?
Foolish... needy... wicked...
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
May... he... rot...
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*
Steel Watchers... were his... greatest weapon...

Synopsis: Speak With Dead dialogue for Gortash's father, Dravo Flymm. Gortash tadpoled his parents, who sold him into slavery in his youth. They were aware of their state but cannot resist the tadpole's compulsion - which made them appear to be huge fans of their son. When they die, the tadpole loses its grip over them.
